amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Salaries and Expenses, Drug Enforcement Administration by $35 million and return to the FY 2014 funding level.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Salaries and Expenses, Drug Enforcement Administration by $35,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 66 - 339 (Roll no. 250).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 66 - 339 (Roll no. 250).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Polis.
